page.title: 13CHANGES IN FASHION
page.content: Some of the changes Sunningdale people mentioned included the fashions and attitudes people have now and had 50 years ago.When asked about old fashion ,one lady said that clothes and hair- styles used to be much neater and tidier and that people used to carry themselves better.She did not go into detail about the actual styles but said that nowadays too many people are round-shouldered and apparently are not able to stand up straight.It was also thought that people used to look much happier.Todays discontent was blamed on too many material possessions and a spiritual vacuum.It was said that Sunningdale used to be tidy village but now it is being buried under a mound of discarded rubbish.Another observation was that before World War 2 most adults wore hats and gloves.
